row.post_process:
:SET &GREENPLUM_CONN_VARIABLE_NAME# = "VARA.HG.DBA.GREENPLUM_CONNECTION_MONITORING.STATIC.RESULTS" :SET &SEND_EMAIL# = "N" :SET &EMAIL_BODY# = "" :SET &NL# = UC_CRLF() :INC JOBI.HG.STANDARD_SCRIPT.INCLUDE_STANDARD_HTML_EMAIL_HEADER :SET &EMAIL_BODY# = '&HTML_EMAIL_HEADER#&NL#' :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"Connection Percent|*") :PROCESS &HND# : SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : SET &LINE# = STR_SUB(&LINE#,"Connection Percent|","") : SET &CONNECTION_PERCENT# = STR_TRIM(&LINE#) : SWITCH "Y" : CASE &CONNECTION_PERCENT# between 30 and 85 : SET &SEND_EMAIL# = "Y" : SET &EMAIL_SUBJECT# = "Greenplum Database &GREENPLUM_SERVER# Max Connection Issue" : SET &EMAIL_BODY# = "&EMAIL_BODY#

Warning! &GREENPLUM_SERVER# at &CONNECTION_PERCENT#% of maximum connections.

&NL#" : PRINT "Connection Warning" : CASE &CONNECTION_PERCENT# between 85 and 101 : SET &SEND_EMAIL# = "Y" : SET &ADDITIONAL_RECIPIENT# = "dba_madison@healthgrades.opsgenie.net" : SET &EMAIL_SUBJECT# = "Greenplum Database &GREENPLUM_SERVER# Max Connection Critical Issue" : SET &EMAIL_BODY# = "&EMAIL_BODY#

Critical Warning! &GREENPLUM_SERVER# at &CONNECTION_PERCENT#% of maximum connections.

&NL#" : PRINT "Connection Critical Error" : OTHER : PRINT "Connection threshold fine" : ENDSWITCH :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :SET &EMAIL_BODY# = "&EMAIL_BODY#" :IF &SEND_EMAIL# = "Y" : SET &INTERVAL_NOTIFICATION_VARIABLE# = &GREENPLUM_CONN_VARIABLE_NAME# : SET &INTERVAL_KEY# = &GREENPLUM_SERVER# : SET &INTERVAL_NOTIFICATION_TIME# = "006000" : INC JOBI.HG.STANDARD_SCRIPT.INTERVAL_NOTIFICATION_CHECK : IF &SEND_INTERVAL_NOTIFICATION# = "Y" : SET &SEND_EMAIL# = "Y" : ELSE : SET &SEND_EMAIL# = "N" : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &SEND_EMAIL# = "Y" : IF STR_FIND(&EMAIL_SUBJECT#,"Critical") <> 0 : SET &SEND_DB_ALERT_SLACK_MESSAGE# = "Y" : ELSE : SET &SEND_DB_ALERT_SLACK_MESSAGE# = "N" : ENDIF : SET &ADDITIONAL_RECIPIENT# = "dba_madison@healthgrades.opsgenie.net" : SET &SEND_DB_ALERT_SLACK_MESSAGE# = "Y" : INC JOBI.HG.DBA.STANDARD_SCRIPT.MONITORING_NOTIFICATION :ENDIF
